summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6005 for the improvement of Northlake Avenue, from approximately 45 feet west of the west margin of Waterway No. 22 to approximately 420 feet west thereof; by constructing a retaining wall and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 80642, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
